name: The Wanderer Vibes: Neon
description:
This game was created using RPGmaker MV over a week in July of 2020 for the Portland Indie Game Squad (PIGSquad) June Summer Slow Jam. The technical theme was "Music first" and the creative theme was "Ghost notes" 
** Any and All donations are funneled back into Portland Indie Game Squad!! **

*** Music and Sound volume has been reduced by half, this is a game, not a dance club***

Play as the wanderer known as Key, as they check out what happened to the music of the Neon Vibe Realm.  With their trusty key tar, and the aid of a van driving jellyfish, they set out to defeat the ghostly Maestro!

 Tackle each area in any order! The music changes as you go!

Talk to the 'mini' van in the starting area to turn on "Story" mode if you want to
trivialize combat!

Player Input:

  • Arrow Keys( Up/Down/Left/Right): Movement and Menu navigation
  • ESC /X: To bring up the menu
  • Either Shift key: Dash
  • Z: To interact and Choose menu Item.

Credits:

  • Title text: Sins Font from Humble Fonts by Eeve Somepx
  • In game font and sfx from RPGMaker core assets
  • Programming, Art, and Music by me!
